name: Royal 1HP Split Basic Air Conditioner (MA09RSA)
description: The Royal 1HP Split Air Conditioner MA09RSA  helps you enjoy clean filtered air thereby reducing high Humidity, work stress,risk of Dehydration and gives you a better Air Quality.The Royal Air Conditioner is a combination of attractive design, unbeatable efficiency and durability at the best price. The Split Unit Air Conditioner has a 1HP Capacity and offers quick cooling once turned on. It features Turbo mode and sleep mode and has auto restart and anti-fungus features, as well as an anti-rust cabinet.

name: ADIDAS Galaxy 6 Shoes Men
description: Lace up and go. These adidas running shoes will keep you comfortable, however late your day runs. A great everyday shoe, they have a light and airy mesh upper to keep your feet cool and a Cloudfoam midsole for springiness. The rubber outsole is designed to stay firm across all surfaces, from wet grass to slow clay. Switch up your plans without changing your shoes.

description: A memory card is an Electronic apple product data storage device used for storing digital information, typically using flash memory.
